reviewText: Well presented and in-depth enough coverage of the war in the Pacific.  Some great footage, and a good job of not altering the facts, like some "historical" sets do.  I'm sure I'll watch it more than once.
The one BAD VERY BAD feture no closed caption for people with hearing problems that depend 100% on closed caption. This should be cooected ASAP!!

Excellent series on the War in the Pacific.  It is a take off on
"Crusade In The Pacific" series and very informative and is excellent
for a student that is assigned to study World War II in the Pacific.
